document.full_text: the chinese mining company minmetals resources said on tuesday that it had dropped its unsolicited bid for equinox minerals after being outbid by barrick gold.
document.title: minmetals withdraws equinox bid after barrick offer
lines_and_colors: the chinese mining company minmetals resources said on tuesday that it had dropped its unsolicited bid for equinox minerals after being outbid by barrick gold.
